title: Louisiana Public Records Act Request: Louisiana Parish Prison Visitation, Telephone, Video Policies/Reports (Richland Parish Sheriff)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Louisiana Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

1. Any and all policies, procedures, directives, or equivalent guiding materials regarding the visitation of individuals in custody of this agency.

2. Any and all policies, procedures, directives, or equivalent guiding materials regarding the use of telephones, video conferencing equipment, or other telecommunications and electronic communication by individuals in the custody of this agency.

3. Any and all open or active bidding or Requests for Proposal regarding the provision, installation, maintenance, or use of telephones, video conferencing equipment, or other electronic communication and telecommunication services.

4. Any and all active contracts regarding the provision, installation, maintenance, or use of telephones, video conferencing equipment, or other electronic communication and telecommunication services. Please include all associated supplemental materials, including any and all attachments and exhibits. Please provide any other materials regarding the terms of service.

5. Any and all financial reports or invoices related to the provision, installation, maintenance, or use of telephones, video conferencing equipment, or other electronic communication and telecommunication services. Please include all usage, commission, and fee reports, providing as much segregable data as possible.

6. All communications for the period from  January 1, 2020 through December 1, 2023 between this agency or any representative thereof and any prison telecommunications company or organization, including but not limited to City Tele Coin. 

7. All communications for the period from January 1, 2020 through December 1, 2023 between this agency or any representative thereof and any representative of the Louisiana Public Service Commission.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Reagan Ross

title: Police Report & Files - Cantrell Funeral Home (Michigan State Police)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Michigan Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Copies of the investigative file related to Cantrell Funeral Home located at 10400 Mack Avenue, Detroit, Wayne County, specifically related to the October 2018 discovery of multiple sets of human remains within the home. Inspections of the funeral home were conducted on August 29 and October 12, 2018. Please include the responding officers' reports and interview recordings/transcripts, if available. Photographs and body camera footage do not need to be included.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Caitlin Downey
